title: Were nursing homes in New York full of COVID-19 patients while the hospital ship was empty?
subtitle: It appears that bureaucratic obstacles prevented the full use of a hospital ship in New York City.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: New York Goff. Andrew Como asked to send thousands of patients from COVID-19 to nursing homes, while USNS Rest, a hospital ship sent to New York to help treat patients, sat empty and unused.
